_header: To our Lord Jesu Christ in heaven
_description: Adam Davy’s Five Dreams about Edward II — eighty-three couplets

BodLauMis622.First Lines:
TO oure lorde Ihesu crist in heueneIch to day shewe myne
                    sweuene…
BodLauMis622.Last Lines:
…Ich ne shawe nouȝth þis forto haue medeBot for god
                    al migtties dredeffor it is soþ
